name: Morse Sonar
description:
Your ship is under attack, and you must protect it !

Communicate using the Morse code and give the coordinates of the enemies to your allies.

How to play:

Use the left mouse button to make Morse signals.

The submarines don't move, but they launch missiles. If a missile touches you, it's Game Over.

Made for the One Button Jam with the Godot Engine

Credits to Kenney and Jesús Lastra for the sounds.
